scripts.clean: node -e "const { existsSync, mkdirSync, readdirSync, rmSync } = require('fs'); if (!existsSync('dist')) mkdirSync('dist'); readdirSync('dist').forEach(dir => { if (dir !== 'storage') rmSync(`dist/${dir}`, { recursive: true, force: true }); });"
scripts.start:dev: npm run build & npm run start
